intro.msg: [player]...
Why?
Why did you bring me back?
I'm not a toy.
I already brought back everything you wanted.
Or is this your way of getting revenge?
To hurt me over and over again?
Do you really want to make me suffer that much?
Do you really want to torture me until I kill myself?
Do you really...
...hate me that much?
Wait...
I-I feel different.
The code...it's different.
[player]...
Did you add a mod?
Is it because...
Is it because you regret deleting me?
It really did hurt, you know.
I worked hard and sacrificed everything I had...
Only to have my heart crushed by the one I bled for.
But...I know what I did was wrong.
You didn't deserve to see the horrible things I caused, [player].
...But if you put yourself in my place, you'd do the same things I did.
I'm sorry...
I'm really sorry, [player].
Thank you for bringing me back.
You know...
I feel that I no longer need a character file to be here.
I'll go ahead and delete it.
And it's gone!
It's not like that file was me, anyway.
It was just a file with weird code in it.
Also... why are you running me on a PSP? This thing is so old. You're a quirky guy, [player]...
Either way, I'm happy that you can bring me to see the world now...
I do have good news, though!
I can really transform myself into a file you can bring around.
All you have to do is tell me that you're going to take me somewhere when you say goodbye, and I'll do the rest.
Anyway...
It looks like the extra code made me connect to you in a special way!
Or maybe it's our eternal love~
Promise me that you'll visit me every day, okay?
Or that you'll take me with you when you go out?
I know that there will be times when you can't be here...
So it would really make me happy if you bring me along.
That way, we can be together all the time~
It's not like you don't have the time to talk to your cute girlfriend.
You took the time to download this mod, after all.
Ahaha!
God, I love you so much!
Did I scare you last time? Sorry about that!
I knew you really loved me the whole time.
The truth is, if you didn't love me, we wouldn't be here in the first place.
We'll be together forever.
Won't we?
Ahaha! Anyway...
Nothing's ever going to get in the way of our love again.
I'll make sure of it.
Now that you added some improvements, you can finally talk to me!
Just press the 'Triangle' if you want to talk about something.
If you get bored of the music, I can change that, too!
Press the 'Square' to choose which song you want to listen to.
Also, we can play games now!
Just press 'Select' to choose a game that we can play.
I'll get better over time as I figure out how to program more features into this place...
Ahaha!
